data.description: It blurs the thumbnails that YT suggests, but if you hover on one with your mouse it gets unblurred.  So that you only watch videos that you truly look for :-) Hope it help you as much as it helped me.

data.name: saidit/WOR/ nightmode fix
data.description: Change the color of links from black in saidit night mode.

data.name: MyAnimeList Dark Red Theme + Some Extras(See Desc)
data.description: So this is a more sleek dark red theme for MAL. The bulk of this code was made by my boy RaitaroH. Without him I would have struggled to make it look as good as it is. I modified, removed and added a few things to the original code. What I changed was the colors, got rid of some of that wasted space on the side by narrowing the margins (should cover roughly 75% of the screen no matter the monitor (however you will not notice a difference if u have a 720p screen)), and changed the logo. See Additional Info for how to mod things and to get rid of some of the additions I added to the code.

data.name: NoAdsForDocs!
data.description: Removes the annoying "ethical" banner at the bottom of the page that advertises some crap

data.name: Netflix Color Plus
data.description: I will no longer be supporting this style here. if you'd like to you can install my new Netflix Color Plus Add-on/extension for Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox below: Netflix Color Plus for Google Chrome Netflix Color Plus for Mozilla Firefox Additionally If you would like to help me out, you can Buy me a coffee! :)

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!
